mapper.select: SELECT s.*, e.name as employee_name, e.emp_no FROM salary s LEFT JOIN employee e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO salary (employee_id, year_month, base_salary, performance, allowance, deduction, actual_salary, status, pay_date, create_time) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{yearMonth}, #{baseSalary}, #{performance}, #{allowance}, #{deduction}, #{actualSalary}, #{status}, #{payDate}, NOW())
